name: postgresus
description: Postgresus is a lightweight multi-tenant PostgreSQL management platform with a web UI for creating and managing databases, users, and access. It streamlines multi-db setups for developers and hosting providers.
features: Multi-tenant management: Create and manage multiple PostgreSQL databases from a single interface.
User provisioning: Quickly create database users with customizable permissions and access controls.
Database creation: Spin up new databases with predefined templates and configurations.
Access control: Manage user permissions and roles across multiple databases and tenants.
Web interface: Administer databases through a lightweight, responsive web UI without command-line access.
Connection strings: Generate and display connection strings for easy application integration.
Resource monitoring: Track database sizes, connection counts, and resource usage per tenant.
Backup management: Schedule and manage database backups with retention policies.
Template databases: Create database templates for consistent provisioning across tenants.
API access: Automate database provisioning and management through a RESTful API.
Hosting provider ready: Designed for hosting providers managing databases for multiple clients.
Lightweight design: Minimal resource footprint suitable for shared hosting environments.
